verses.verse: Now it came to pass, when Adoni-zedek <S%H139><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> had heard <S%H8085><s%> how <S%H3588><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and had utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it; as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%>, so he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and her king <S%H4428><s%>; and how the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> had made peace <S%H7999><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and were among <S%H7130><s%> them;

That they feared <S%H3372><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>, because Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> was a great <S%H1419><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, as one <S%H259><s%> of the royal <S%H4467><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, and because it was greater <S%H1419><s%> than Ai <S%H5857><s%>, and all the men <S%H582><s%> thereof were mighty <S%H1368><s%>.

Wherefore Adoni-zedek <S%H139><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto Hoham <S%H1944><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and unto Piram <S%H6502><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%>, and unto Japhia <S%H3309><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, and unto Debir <S%H1688><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon <S%H5700><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Come up <S%H5927><s%> unto me, and help <S%H5826><s%> me, that we may smite <S%H5221><s%> Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>: for it hath made peace <S%H7999><s%> with Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Therefore the five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon <S%H5700><s%>, gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%>, they and all their hosts <S%H4264><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> before Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>, and made war <S%H3898><s%> against it.

¶ And the men <S%H582><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Slack <S%H7503><s%> not thy hand <S%H3027><s%> from thy servants <S%H5650><s%>; come up <S%H5927><s%> to us quickly <S%H4120><s%>, and save <S%H3467><s%> us, and help <S%H5826><s%> us: for all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are gathered together <S%H6908><s%> against us.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, he, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with him, and all the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of valour <S%H2428><s%>.

¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> them not: for I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>; there shall not a man <S%H376><s%> of them stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore came <S%H935><s%> unto them suddenly <S%H6597><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> all night <S%H3915><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> discomfited <S%H2000><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> at Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>, and chased <S%H7291><s%> them along the way <S%H1870><s%> that goeth up <S%H4608><s%> to Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> them to Azekah <S%H5825><s%>, and unto Makkedah <S%H4719><s%>.

And it came to pass, as they fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and were in the going down <S%H4174><s%> to Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%>, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> cast down <S%H7993><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon them unto Azekah <S%H5825><s%>, and they died <S%H4191><s%>: they were more <S%H7227><s%> which died <S%H4191><s%> with hailstones <S%H1259><s%> <S%H68><s%> than they whom <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

¶ Then spake <S%H1696><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered up <S%H5414><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Sun <S%H8121><s%>, stand thou still <S%H1826><s%> upon Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>; and thou, Moon <S%H3394><s%>, in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Ajalon <S%H357><s%>.

And the sun <S%H8121><s%> stood still <S%H1826><s%>, and the moon <S%H3394><s%> stayed <S%H5975><s%>, until the people <S%H1471><s%> had avenged <S%H5358><s%> themselves upon their enemies <S%H341><s%>. Is not this <S%H1931><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of Jasher <S%H3477><s%>? So the sun <S%H8121><s%> stood still <S%H5975><s%> in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and hasted <S%H213><s%> not to go down <S%H935><s%> about a whole <S%H8549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And there was no day <S%H3117><s%> like that before <S%H6440><s%> it or after <S%H310><s%> it, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
¶ And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, unto the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>.
But these five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%>, and hid <S%H2244><s%> themselves in a cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah <S%H4719><s%>.

And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> are found <S%H4672><s%> hid <S%H2244><s%> in a cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah <S%H4719><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Roll <S%H1556><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> upon the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave <S%H4631><s%>, and set <S%H6485><s%> men <S%H582><s%> by it for to keep <S%H8104><s%> them:

And stay <S%H5975><s%> ye not, but pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>, and smite the hindmost <S%H2179><s%> of them; suffer <S%H5414><s%> them not to enter <S%H935><s%> into their cities <S%H5892><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of slaying <S%H5221><s%> them with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%>, till they were consumed <S%H8552><s%>, that the rest <S%H8300><s%> which remained <S%H8277><s%> of them entered <S%H935><s%> into fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>: none moved <S%H2782><s%> his tongue <S%H3956><s%> against any <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Open <S%H6605><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave <S%H4631><s%>, and bring out <S%H3318><s%> those five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> unto me out of the cave <S%H4631><s%>.

And they did <S%H6213><s%> so, and brought forth <S%H3318><s%> those five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> unto him out of the cave <S%H4631><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon <S%H5700><s%>.

And it came to pass, when they brought out <S%H3318><s%> those kings <S%H4428><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto the captains <S%H7101><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> which went <S%H1980><s%> with him, Come near <S%H7126><s%>, put <S%H7760><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> upon the necks <S%H6677><s%> of these kings <S%H4428><s%>. And they came near <S%H7126><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> their feet <S%H7272><s%> upon the necks <S%H6677><s%> of them.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not, nor be dismayed <S%H2865><s%>, be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of good courage <S%H553><s%>: for thus shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to all your enemies <S%H341><s%> against whom ye fight <S%H3898><s%>.

And afterward <S%H310><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> them, and slew <S%H4191><s%> them, and hanged <S%H8518><s%> them on five <S%H2568><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>: and they were hanging <S%H8518><s%> upon the trees <S%H6086><s%> until the evening <S%H6153><s%>.

And it came to pass at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, and they took them down <S%H3381><s%> off the trees <S%H6086><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into the cave <S%H4631><s%> wherein they had been hid <S%H2244><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in the cave's <S%H4631><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>, which remain until this very <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

¶ And that day <S%H3117><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Makkedah <S%H4719><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%>, them, and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein; he let <S%H7604><s%> none remain <S%H8300><s%>: and he did <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> as he did <S%H6213><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> from Makkedah <S%H4719><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, unto Libnah <S%H3841><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Libnah <S%H3841><s%>:

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> it also, and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and he smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein; he let <S%H7604><s%> none remain <S%H8300><s%> in it; but did <S%H6213><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof as he did <S%H6213><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

¶ And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> from Libnah <S%H3841><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, unto Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against it, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against it:

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> Lachish <S%H3923><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which took <S%H3920><s%> it on the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein, according to all that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Libnah <S%H3841><s%>.

¶ Then Horam <S%H2036><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer <S%H1507><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> Lachish <S%H3923><s%>; and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> him and his people <S%H5971><s%>, until he had left <S%H7604><s%> him none remaining <S%H8300><s%>.

¶ And from Lachish <S%H3923><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> unto Eglon <S%H5700><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him; and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> against it, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against it:

And they took <S%H3920><s%> it on that day <S%H3117><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>, according to all that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Lachish <S%H3923><s%>.
And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from Eglon <S%H5700><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, unto Hebron <S%H2275><s%>; and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against it:

And they took <S%H3920><s%> it, and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof, and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein; he left <S%H7604><s%> none remaining <S%H8300><s%>, according to all that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Eglon <S%H5700><s%>; but destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it utterly, and all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein.
¶ And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, to Debir <S%H1688><s%>; and fought <S%H3898><s%> against it:

And he took <S%H3920><s%> it, and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof; and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> that were therein; he left <S%H7604><s%> none remaining <S%H8300><s%>: as he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, so he did <S%H6213><s%> to Debir <S%H1688><s%>, and to the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof; as he had done <S%H6213><s%> also to Libnah <S%H3841><s%>, and to her king <S%H4428><s%>.

¶ So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> all the country <S%H776><s%> of the hills <S%H2022><s%>, and of the south <S%H5045><s%>, and of the vale <S%H8219><s%>, and of the springs <S%H794><s%>, and all their kings <S%H4428><s%>: he left <S%H7604><s%> none remaining <S%H8300><s%>, but utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> all that breathed <S%H5397><s%>, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> them from Kadesh-barnea <S%H6947><s%> even unto Gaza <S%H5804><s%>, and all the country <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, even unto Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>.

And all these kings <S%H4428><s%> and their land <S%H776><s%> did Joshua <S%H3091><s%> take <S%H3920><s%> at one <S%H259><s%> time <S%H6471><s%>, because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%>, and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, unto the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>.
